name: places/ChIJi5Fh8lNYwokRR9h6brtGvZw

displayName.text: Styling by Krys - NYC Wardrobe Consultant & Personal Shopper

formattedAddress: 325 W 45th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 325 W 45th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
Working with Krys is always a pleasure. When I first started working with her she helped me organize my closet and get rid of items that didn’t necessarily flatter my style. She helped me put outfits together for different occasions and helped me with accessories. She really is the style whisperer and I look up to her and her advice all the time. Krys also helped me shopping for me and my husband to update our closets.
Krys is very respectful of your budget and needs and you should definitely look into working with her. Follow her on Instagram. Great content.

originalText.text:
I love working with Krys on all of my styling needs, particularly as a busy mom of two - she totally gets it! She’s knowledgeable, organized and makes every experience special, all while enhancing and improving my wardrobe easily.
I highly recommend Styling by Krys!

text.text:
I love working with Krys on all of my styling needs, particularly as a busy mom of two - she totally gets it! She’s knowledgeable, organized and makes every experience special, all while enhancing and improving my wardrobe easily.
I highly recommend Styling by Krys!

originalText.text:
Krys is awesome! I reached out to her this spring, after. After 2 babies, my body had changed and I wanted new clothes. Prior, I had tried a large trunk service. Despite specifying my price point and body changes, they sent me ridiculous pieces ($400/top) that were the opposite of what I had asked for post-babies. When I told Krys about what I was looking for her, she helped me buy amazing pieces for summer and fall; work and home; casual and formal. The pieces were a variety of price points (by my request), and things I never would have picked out for myself! She immediately understood my concerns about clothes after 2 babies and this was reflected in the pieces she chose for me. I have some amazing outfits for work and going out with friends now!

One thing to note is she is great at navigating tricky stores. For example, I have never shopped at ASOS because I am overwhelmed by the amount of clothes they have. She is great at figuring out what's good, and she helped me get 5 tops and dresses at amazing prices that fit great!

I just asked her to help shop for my husband, and can't wait to buy the pieces she recommends for him!

originalText.text: Thank you for everything Krys! Awesome job organizing my wardrobe and discarding items that I didn't realize I've kept over the years. Looking forward to shopping with you soon, and helping me get me out of my comfort zone. I highly recommend!!!
